@title Router token swapping functionality

params.params: The parameters necessary for the swap, encoded as `SwapParams` in calldata

returns.amountOut: The amount of the received token

params.params: The parameters necessary for the multi-hop swap, encoded as `SwapMultiParams` in calldata

returns.amountOut: The amount of the received token
